checklistName: Any Director of a New Hire after Selection
checklistDescription: Items for any director of a new hire.

conveySupervisorToTalent.displayName: Conveys supervisor information to Talent POC

conveyTeamToTalent.displayName: Conveys team information to Talent POC

conveyLocationToTalent.displayName: Conveys location information to Talent POC

congratsEmail.description: Writes congrats email to candidate and requests references and documents / cc's Leah Glitter + Talent POC on email

learnStartDate.description: Talent will let you know the new hire's start date a week before they start.

setUpCoffee.description: Reach out to new hire to say hello and set up coffee. During coffee, explain your policy on billable hours. (Many new hires will be reassurance on this point.)
